      • isValidExit

        protected boolean isValidExit(java.lang.String instruction)
        To check whether the instruction for exit is valid
        Parameters:
        instruction - the instruction given by the user
        Returns:
        true if the instruction given match the valid exit parameters; false if the given instruction is invalid to quit

      • isValidInput

        protected boolean isValidInput(java.lang.String instruction,
                               Room currentRoom,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> onHands)
        To check whether the instruction given by the user is valid and hence the adventure can be processed to next move
        Parameters:
        instruction - the instruction given by the user
        currentRoom - the room the person is in now and provide the valid direction options
        onHands - the String array stores the objects carried by player
        Returns:
        true if the instruction given by the user can be identified to proceed the adventure or terminate

      • processTheOrder

        protected Room processTheOrder(java.lang.String instruction,
                               Room currentRoom,
                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> onHands,
                               java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Room> map)
        Process the instruction given by the user and make modifications accordingly
        Parameters:
        instruction - the String input by the user
        currentRoom - the Room that the user is in now
        onHands - the String array stores the objects carried by player
        map - the hashmap connecting the String of room name and the Room object
        Returns:
        the current room which may have been modified or the room that user is going to enter

      • isValidLayout

        protected boolean isValidLayout(Layout testLayout)
        To check whether the layout is valid. For every room,If room A have the access to room B ,B must exist in the layout. if room A have the direct access to room B, then room B must have the direct access to room A.
        Parameters:
        testLayout - the layout given by the user
        Returns:
        ture if it is a valid layout ; false if it is an invalid layout.
